        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Expert Brain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Sachverständige Gehirn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Cerveau Expert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Cérebro Perito</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a virtual exhibit of 10 different .Illusions of face and motion expertise
Accompanied by explanations and some activities</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">illusions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine virtuelle Ausstellung von 10 
unterschiedlichen Illusions Gesicht und Bewegung expertiseAccompanied 
durch Erklärungen und etwas Aktivitäten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un objet exposé virtuel de 10 Illusions 
Différents de visage et le mouvement expertiseAccompanied par des 
explications et quelques activités</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma exibição virtual de 10 Illusions 
Diferentes da cara e o movimento expertiseAccompanied por 
explanações e por algumas atividades</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'esposizione virtuale di 10 Illusions 
Differenti della faccia ed il movimento expertiseAccompanied dalle 
spiegazioni e da alcune attività</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα εικονικό έκθεμα 10 διαφορετικών. 
παραισθήσεων του προσώπου και της κίνησης expertiseAccompanied 
από τις εξηγήσεις και μερικές δραστηριότητες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un objeto expuesto virtual de 10 diversos
Illusions De cara y el movimiento expertiseAccompanied por 
explicaciones y algunas actividades</string>
          </description>
